title: loot-name-ward-skin-rental-16 Not Appearing in Inventory

embed.description: Pretty sure this is the best ward skin. Can't wait to redeem **lootnamewardskinrental_16

body:
I Opened a hextech chest and got this... Me and my friend had a good laugh, Plus it looked funny... But then I activated and went to start a game... Checked my Skin wards and... It wasn't there.... Just thought you should be aware and I have linked to another post about it that had picture proof... I didn't think to take pictures at the time.

Also I Realize this is kinda a bug, but there is already a discussion in bugs, and considering I bought an item I didn't receive I think that I need Help and support.

replies.body: This is a display issue that we're currently looking into, but have no eta just yet.  These ward skins are unlocked on the accounts, but they are not selectable.  I was able to confirm that the Mother Serpent Ward and Banner of the Horse Wards are on your account.  I hope that helps put you at ease!

Umm so just to update, I still don't have the Banner of horse ward skin. Although I do have the Mother Serpent ward. Also when I went to check my wards I noticed that my Astronaut poro ward skin is now missing aswell... Whatever the problem is the last update seems to have made it worse lol.
Same here, i unlocked a ward skin and i can't use it...
i have the same problem but my ward was: loot name ward skin rental 34. I unlock it today but, i can select it. I want to fix this bug as soon as posible.
i have the same problem! To be honest the wardskin looks awesome and i really wants it but it just does not show up :/

This is a known bug, but there is currently no ETA for a fix. When they are able to push a fix you'll be able to access your ward skin. If you are still unable to you can submit a [Support Ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) for the missing content. I suggest checking the bug fix section of the next patch notes.
